commenter_a: Lol i guess those dogs was watching to much YouTube where people had their dogs chasing away mountain lions and big cats thinking they was really scared of a dog lol guess again.
post_message: 'This video is heart wrenching,' says a Rancho Cucamonga animal-lover whose security cameras captured his dog being dragged to its death by a coyote.   Oliver, a 9-year-old dachshund, was chasing the intruder coyote away from his sister dog when the wild animal grabbed him.  'Even a 7- foot wall won't keep your pets safe,' the homeowner warns.  Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
